name: Knights of the Rebound Table
description:
This game was made by:
Paul Herron and Tomasz Galka as a part of our DT508 First Year Roguelite Assignment.
Lance Controls: WASD | R-Shift = Sprint | Space = Shield | Z = Buy | X = Use Item
Merle Controls Arrow Keys | L = Sprint | K = Shield | O = Buy | P = Use Item
Your objective is to defend your side of the crystal from the wizards!
Gold persists upon starting a new playthrough.
There are 4 achievements in total to get. Bronze, Silver, Gold and Legendary.

Bronze: Do at least 4 playthroughs, earn at least 2500g in total, reflect at least 100 projectiles in total, clear at least 24 rooms and generate at least 128 rooms. (128 rooms are generated per playthrough)

Silver:
First earn Bronze, Do at least 6 playthroughs, earn at least 7500g in total, reflect at least 200 projectiles in total, clear at least 56 rooms and generate at least 512 rooms.
Gold:
First earn Bronze and Silver, Do at least 16 playthroughs, earn at least 16000g in total, reflect at least 400 projectiles in total, clear at least 154 rooms, generate at least 1200 rooms, and play for at least 2 hours.

Legendary:
First earn Bronze, Silver and Gold, Do at least 64 playthroughs, earn at least 100000g in total, reflect at least 10000 projectiles in total, clear at least 724 rooms, generate at least 7500 rooms, and play for at least 8 hours.

Thanks for playing and I hope you like it!

This game is in SUPER BETA so bugs are inevitable!

All sounds used are free to use.

All sprites were made by Paul Herron.

All code was done by Tomasz Galka.
